author: tvami
body:
#### PR description:

Inspired by the mistake in https://github.com/dmwm/T0/pull/4635#pullrequestreview-810983243
We propose to rename this mapping to be consistent with the wf name. There is no technical advantage if this, no changes are expected, this is mainly cosmetics.

#### PR validation:

Tried to run
`runTheMatrix.py -l 1001.2`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Change SiPixel LA PCL naming in autoPCL file
